name: Black Blade
description:
This game is a classic puzzle game that is relatively simple, but requires a certain level of strategy and thinking ability. The main goal of the game is to push all the boxes to the designated position.

In the game, players need to control their characters by moving and pushing boxes. Players need to observe the map, understand the features and patterns of the map, analyze the movement patterns of the box, and design the best movement route to push the box to the designated position faster and more effectively.

Game operation mode

Mobile=WASD

Game features

Need a lot of thinking to control the overall situation

A simple little game, for smart people, it's just an appetizer
